content: no sweat cup cozy materials size fits 16 oz 32 oz cold cups yarn approximately 30g 40g of fingering weight yarn held double or 40g dk weight yarn needle us4/3 5mm style desired for small circumference knitting pattern co 64 join to work in the round don t twist i like to knit the first row flat then join in the round work in k1p1 rib for 10 rounds decrease round *k14 k2tog repeat from * 3 more times 60 sts change color here and after each decrease round if desired work in k1p1 rib for 10 rounds decrease round *k13 k2tog repeat from * 3 more times 56 sts work in k1p1 rib for 10 rounds decrease round *k12 k2tog repeat from * 3 more times 52 sts work in k1p1 rib for 10 rounds decrease round *k11 k2tog repeat from * 3 more times 48 sts work in k1p1 rib for 5 rounds begin decreasing for the bottom round 1 k1 k2tog k2 11 times k2tog k1 36 sts round 2 knit around round 3 k1 k2tog k2 8 times k2tog k1 27 sts round 4 knit around round 5 k1 k2tog 9 times 18 sts round 6 knit around round 7 k2tog 9 times 9 sts round 8 knit around cut yarn leaving a tail long enough to thread through the 9 stitches cinch the bottom closed and weave in the ends
